author: Source: San Bernardino County Sun
title: ABCa s a Wicked Citya mixes a 80s L.A. music scene, sex and murder - San Bernardino County Sun
text:
"Wicked City," starring Ed Westwick and Erika Christensen, starts Tuesday, Oct. 27 for an 11-episode run. What: A limited 11-episode series about a serial killer stalking Los Angeles in 1982, starring Ed Westwick and Jeremy Sisto, While doing research on the Internet, writer-producer Steven Baigelman fell down one, and the eventual result was “Wicked City,” a new ABC drama set around the search for a serial killer prowling the Sunset Strip in 1982.
 San Bernardino County Sun.
